CARALHO COMO EU AMO ESSE JOGO, comecei no source e amo de paixão a serie ate hoje, o quanto esse jogo me ajudou junto ao meu noivo a lidar com o BPD e incrível, as amizades, os campeonatinhos de cidade, a comunidade em geral, puta que pariu, obrigada por existir cs! que seja longo e cheio de gloria! lembre-se bem, seja positivo e não esqueça encorajar seus aliados, sua experiencia e qualidade de jogo aumenta muito quando você da espaço pro seu time!

Hello!
I have played counter stirke since many years back, and honestly i need steam or who ever made the game free to make it back to normal so that you have too pay for it, and add a bit extra if people want's to buy Prime status.
I honestly want to say this game is shit because since you cant enjoy the game in community servers because there is always new accounts with rank 1 in game and steam level 0. And the worst part is that they are hacking. I was just watching a guy in a community server and i also recorded him. There is alot off proff both here and on youtube that shows this game is full off no skilled people. Thx and for people who is think about starting 2 play this game. Please find something else to play because it's probably not worth your time.
